skill.data.nether_conjuration.name: Nether Conjuration
skill.data.nether_conjuration.combo: Discard a Wound to Gain a Red or Black Mana Essence or any non-Wound Card for a White or Green Mana Essence
skill.data.nether_conjuration.combo.woun: <style="status">Discard</style> a <style="wound">Wound</style> to Gain a <style="value">Red</style> or <style="value">Black</style> Mana Essence
skill.data.nether_conjuration.combo.non_: <style="status">Discard</style> a non-Wound Card to Gain a <style="value">White</style> or <style="value">Green</style> Mana Essence
